column2: The Amazing Spider-Man: The Movie Adaptation (2014) #1
column6: GET READY FOR THE AMAZING SPIDER-MAN 2 WITH AN AWESOME ADAPTATION OF THE WEB-SLINGER'S LATEST HIT FILM! When danger threatens the city, high school student Peter Parker leaps into action as the wall-crawling Spider-Man! Spider-Man! The Lizard! Gwen Stacy! All this and more movie magic!
